Class BoatRecords

java.lang.Object
BoatRecords
public class BoatRecords extends Object
The BoatRecords class manages a fleet of boats allowing the user to add, remove, and view boats as well as manage boat-related expenses. It interacts with a list of boats and provides a menu for the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • BoatRecords

      public BoatRecords()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the fleet management system. It loads boat data from a csv file, displays a menu to the user, and processes user input to manage boats and expenses.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments

    • getMenuOfChoices

      private static char getMenuOfChoices(Scanner keyboard)
      Displays a menu of options to the user and returns the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      keyboard - A Scanner object used to capture user input.
      Returns:
      The character representing the user's choice from the menu.

    • printInventory

      public static void printInventory()
      Prints the current inventory of boats, including each boat's details and total paid and spent amounts.

    • addBoat

      private static void addBoat()
      Prompts the user to enter a new boat's data in csv format, validates the input, and adds the boat to the fleet if the input is correct.

    • removeBoat

      private static void removeBoat()
      Removes a boat from the fleet based on the boat's name. If the boat is found, it is removed. Otherwise an error message is displayed.

    • requestPermission

      public static void requestPermission()
      Prompts the user to request permission to spend money on a specific boat. If the expense is within the remaining budget, the expense is authorized. Otherwise a message is displayed indicating the remaining budget.

    • loadBoatData

      public static void loadBoatData(String csvBoatFile, ArrayList<Boat> boatList) throws IOException
      Loads boat data from a csv file into the boat list. Each line in the file represents a boat's attributes and is used to create a new Boat object.
      Parameters:
      csvBoatFile - The path to the csv file containing boat data.
      boatList - The list to store the loaded boats.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the file.
